item.title: Science & Engineering Extracurricular Award - Introduction to R
item.description: R as a calculator Vectors, variables and other objects 1. type: sub-section R as a calculator 1.1 R as a calculator 1 + 1 [1] 2 10 - 5 [1] 5 10 / 2 [1] 5 2^3 # to the power of [1] 8 2 * 5 # with or without spaces [1] 10 2*5 [1] 10 Spaces can make it easier to read the code
